qmmm.help: Executes qmmm calculations for individual molecules and clusters

print_regions_pdb.help: print the geometry of the regions to a pdb file

max_iterations.help: max iterations for qmmm scf loop

job_file.help: name of jobfile to which jobs are written

write_parse_states.help: states to write jobs for and which to parse from jobfile

regions.help: Definitions of all regions inside qmmmm

type.help: qmregion with dft and optionally gwbse

state.help: initial state to track or ground state for dftcalculations

extgrid.help: grid on which the interaction with classical regions is compute

delta_e.help: if energy difference for this region is below this value it is considered converged

delta_d.help: if RMS difference of density matrix is below this value it is considered converged

type.help: polar region with polarisation dipoles and thole damping

delta_e.help: if energy difference for this region is below this value it is considered converged

delta_d.help: if RMS difference of all dipoles in the is below this value it is considered converged

type.help: static region consisting of multipoles(up to quadrupoles)
